trans-unit.source: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.
trans-unit.target: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.

trans-unit.source: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.
trans-unit.target: Set how long a speech recognizer ignores silence or unrecognizable sounds (babble) and continues listening for speech input.

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: InitialSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (before any recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input is not forthcoming.
trans-unit.target: InitialSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (before any recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input is not forthcoming.

trans-unit.source: BabbleTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer continues to listen to unrecognizable sounds (babble) before it assumes speech input has ended and finalizes the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: BabbleTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer continues to listen to unrecognizable sounds (babble) before it assumes speech input has ended and finalizes the recognition operation.

trans-unit.source: EndSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (after recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input has ended.
trans-unit.target: EndSilenceTimeout - The length of time that a SpeechRecognizer detects silence (after recognition results have been generated) and assumes speech input has ended.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Timeouts can be set on a per-recognizer basis.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Timeouts can be set on a per-recognizer basis.

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition and speech synthesis sample
trans-unit.target: Speech recognition and speech synthesis sample
